ol.title: To edit an existing file:
ol.li: On the Control Panel home page, under File Management, select File List. The File List window appears.
Click the name of the file you want to edit. The Properties window appears.

From this window, in the Actions row, you can do the following:
Delete the file.
Compress the file.
Copy the file.
Move the file.
Rename the file.
Create a shortcut to the file.
View the file print view.
Download the file.
Next to Permissions, you can change the file permissions.

In the File Preview section you can change the word wrap options and edit the text in the File Contents field.
Note: Graphic files cannot be edited from this window.
When you are finished, click Save. Your changes are saved.
